system.description:
This spell allows you to alter and redirect the wind within range. You can cause it to blow inward or outward from your current location, make it rotate clockwise or counter clockwise around your current location, or simply cause it to blow in one specific direction, chosen when the spell is cast.
 You can increase or decrease the intensity of the wind by up to one category per caster rank, plus one category per raise on the spellcasting roll, however the change isn't instant: the wind changes one category per round until it reaches the desired intensity. You may also create an area of calm the size of a Large Burst Template centered on you if you wish.
 After the spell has been cast you cannot change the direction or intensity of the wind further, nor does the effect (or the area of calm) move with you. See the 'Wind Scale' section for further details.
